items.header: What's the aim of this project?
items.body: My main goal is learn a variety of new techniques. I will do so by creating a website on which you can easily play a game of chess against your friends. Later this might be expanded into playing against random opponents or a computer.

items.header: Why did you choose this project?
items.body: I decided to create a chess website because chess is a hobby I've pursued on an off over the years. The necessary techniques also fit the curriculum of the third semester quite well, so it seemed like a good project to combine the two in.
The front-end is written in React, whereas the back-end is written in Java Spring Boot. Among other things, I use microservices to distribute server load, keycloak for authentication and websockets.

I used the visual style of chess.com because it's one of the most commonly known chess websites and the one I frequently use. I wanted to lay the main focus on the functionality rather than webdesign, while keeping things stylish.

items.header: What should you put on a FAQ page?
